lead_paragraph: Police and fire officials say a guest at a Washington hotel died after falling into a boiler shaft on the roof and plunging 10 floors to the basement.
snippet: Police and fire officials say a guest at a Washington hotel died after falling into a boiler shaft on the roof and plunging 10 floors to the basement....

headline.main: DC Hotel Guest Falls 10 Floors to His Death in Boiler Shaft
headline.print_headline: DC Hotel Guest Falls 10 Floors to His Death in Boiler Shaft
